desc: Love chocolate? Emerald Sweets by Katie's Candies has over 20 years of experience making handmade chocolates. Try our best seller, Almond Butter Toffee today!

layout.text: Katie’s Candies- Chehalis Washington has built a 32-year reputation of offering delicious, mouth-watering chocolates to our customers in a friendly and timely manner. Share the good news with your friends on social media.
